TopicTitle: Project Inquiry - stock realistic massive Duna mission series - come watch!

Articles.Content:
Hello all. I'm a YouTuber and Streamer you may have spotted around KSP-TV or the forums. If you have, watch my videos! If you haven't, watch it as well. It's been a pleasure bringing this series to the screen and I hope it's entertaining for you as well.

Here is my most recent video, log 4:

Rate this thread if you like the series! It's one of the only ways I can get my creations out to you guys. Playing Kerbal is amazing in itself, but filming it and showing other fellow gamers is a different level of awesome.

Edited November 27, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
